long_description: Blending comfort and speed, our Novara Express(R) bike offers all the agility and efficiency of a road bike with an upright, comfortable riding position. 6061 aluminum frame is strong and stiff, supplying quick acceleration and efficient power transfer; shaped seatstays and top tube enhance comfort and performance. Fork boasts a tapered alloy steerer with a 1-piece alloy crown for strength and stiffness where it counts; carbon legs help damp road vibrations and reduce weight. Flat handlebar positions the rider upright, thereby reducing the stress to hands, neck and back while also improving heads-up visibility. Bar ends help you stand over the pedals to power up steep ascents; platform pedals with toe cages let you wear everyday shoes while helping keep feet positioned on pedals. Shimano triple crankset and 9-speed cassette provide 27 gears to handle any grade. Shimano trigger shifters and derailleurs offer smooth, precise and dependable shifts. Linear-pull brakes ensure easy speed management. Shimano hubs are laced onto Weinmann rims and outfitted with puncture-resistant, smooth-rolling and reflective Vittoria Randonneur tires for all-around riding. Frame features eyelets for fenders or a rear rack (sold separately) for easy utilitarian upgrading. Replaceable rear derailleur hanger help extends the usable life of the frame. Specs on our Novara Express bike are subject to change.
